title: [Hypixel]以两张新地图庆祝鸡年
author: Lne
txt_content:
本帖最后由 Lne 于 2017-1-28 00:18 编辑 

Today I bring great news for Skyclash and Quakecraft fans!

To celebrate the Lunar New Year and the advent of the Year of the Rooster, we have re-themed 2 maps with a fresh celebratory feel.

Starting today, for the next two weeks you can enjoy Lunar Glade on Skyclash, and Lunar Lostworld on Quakecraft.

We hope you enjoy these new night-time maps, and to anyone celebrating this weekend or otherwise we wish you a very lucky Year of the Rooster 

翻译：今天我带来一个对于Skyclash和Quakecraft(雷神之锤)粉丝来说很好的新闻 我们放出了两张具有快乐气息的地图来庆祝鸡年在今后两周 你可以在skyclash和Quakecraft上游玩这两张地图我们希望你可以享受这些新的夜间地图并使所有人在周末或其他时间来庆祝最后祝你鸡年大吉大利
（我英语很烂轻喷）(由于新闻版不允许发与mojang无关话题所以我发到这里)原帖
